gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.TwoD.Contour
Class ContourColorScaleHandler

java.lang.Object
  gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.TwoD.Contour.ContourChangeHandler
      gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.TwoD.Contour.ContourColorScaleHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeHandler, IPreserveState
public class ContourColorScaleHandler
extends ContourChangeHandler

This is a module of the ContourViewComponent that is responsible for recording and maintaining the state of whether a solid color or colorscale is being used to color the contour plot displayed by the ContourViewComponent. It also records where the colorscale's control is located (on the control panel, to the right of the contour plot, or below the contour plot).

Field Detail

USE_COLORSCALE_KEY

public static final java.lang.String USE_COLORSCALE_KEY
"Use colorscale key" - This static constant String is a key used for referencing the state information that records if a colorscale is currently being used to color the contour plot that this class is listening to. The value that this key references is Boolean.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

COLORSCALE_CONTROL_LOCATION_KEY

public static final java.lang.String COLORSCALE_CONTROL_LOCATION_KEY
"Colorscale location key" - This static constant String is a key used for referencing the state information that records where the colorscale's control is located (on the control panel, to the right of the contour plot, or below the contour plot). The value that this key references is String and is one of the values:
  • CONTROL_PANEL_LOCATION
  • BELOW_IMAGE_LOCATION
  • RIGHT_IMAGE_LOCATION
  • NONE_LOCATION

See Also:
Constant Field Values

COLORSCALE_CONTROL_VISIBLE_KEY

public static final java.lang.String COLORSCALE_CONTROL_VISIBLE_KEY
"Colorscale visible key" - This static constant String is a key used for referencing the state information that records if a colorscale's control is currently visible on the ContourViewComponent that this object is listening to. The value that this key references is a Boolean.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DEFAULT_USE_COLORSCALE

public static final boolean DEFAULT_USE_COLORSCALE
"false" - Specifies if by default a colorscale is used to color the contour plot of the ContourViewComponent that this class is listening to.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DEFAULT_COLORSCALE_LOCATION

public static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_COLORSCALE_LOCATION
Specifies the default location of the colorscale's control that is used with the contour plot of the ContourViewComponent that this class is listening to. The value of this field is the value of the field CONTROL_PANEL_LOCATION.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DEFAULT_COLORSCALE_VISIBLE

public static final boolean DEFAULT_COLORSCALE_VISIBLE
"true" - Specifies if, by default, the colorscale's control, which is used with the contour plot of the ContourViewComponent that this class is listening to, is visible.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

ContourColorScaleHandler

public ContourColorScaleHandler(PropertyChangeConnector connector,
                                InformationCenter center,
                                ContourJPanel panel,
                                boolean useColorscale,
                                java.lang.String colorscaleLocation)
Constructs a module for a ContourViewComponent that handles working with the colorscale/color that is currently being used to color the contour plot.

Parameters:
connector - Serves to connect several modules of a ContourViewComponent so that if a property in one module is changed, the other modules are notified.
center - Serves as the central location where the data shared between several modules of a ContourViewComponent is stored.
panel - The panel that is responsible for rendering the contour plot.
useColorscale - Specifies if a colorscale is initially being used to color the contour plot. That is true specifies that a colorscale is being used and false specifies that a solid color is being used to color the contour plot.
colorscaleLocation - Specifies the initial location of the colorscale's control. The value of this parameter should be one of the following:
  • CONTROL_PANEL_LOCATION
  • BELOW_IMAGE_LOCATION
  • RIGHT_IMAGE_LOCATION
  • NONE_LOCATION
Method Detail

reinit

public void reinit(IVirtualArray2D v2D)
Implemented for the ContourChangeHandler class. This method is invoked when this module needs to be re-initialized with the given data. However, if the data changes, nothing needs to be done by this module. Thus, this method does nothing.

Specified by:
reinit in class ContourChangeHandler
Parameters:
v2D - The new data that is to be displayed by the ContourViewComponent that this class is listening to.
See Also:
ContourChangeHandler.reinit(IVirtualArray2D)

Implemented for the ContourChangeHandler class. This method is invoked when the colorscale being used by the ContourViewComponent that this class is listening to changes.

Overrides:

Parameters:

getUsesColorScale

public boolean getUsesColorScale()
Used to determine if the ContourViewComponent that this class is listening to is using a colorscale to color its contour plot.

Returns:
True if the contour plot is being colored by a colorscale and false if it is being colored by a solid color.

setUsesColorScale

public void setUsesColorScale(boolean useColorscale)
Used to change this class's record which records if the ContourViewComponent that is being listened to by this class has its contour plot colored by a colorscale or not. Note: this method changes this classes record and notifies all listeners that the state of whether the colorscale is being used has changed.

Parameters:
useColorscale - True if a colorscale should be used and false if a solid color should be used.
